bibliography:
John Buridan, Quaestiones super Libros Quattuor de Caelo
et Mundo, ed. E. A. Moody, Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of
America, 1942.

John Duns Scotus, On the Will and Morality,
selected and translated by Allan B. Wolter, Washington, DC: Catholic
University of America Press, 1997.

Marsilius of Inghen, “Si essent plures mundi,
(Quaestiones libri de caelo et mundo I, qu. xiv),” in
Braakhuis and Hoenen (1992), 108–116.

Nicole Oresme, Le Livre du ciel et du monde, tr. A.
J. Menut, Madison: University of Wisconsin Press, 1968.

Thomas Aquinas, Summa Theologiae, Turin:
Marietti, 1952–6.

William of Conches, Glosa super Platonem, ed. F.
Jeauneau, Paris: Vrin, 1965.

William of Ockham Expositio in Libros Physicorum

St. Bonaventure, NY: St. Bonaventure University Press, 1985.

William of Ockham, Reportatio II, in Opera

–––, 1987, William Ockham, Notre Dame,
